name: GarageEscape Slatwall Panel Kit
description: The GarageEscape Slatwall Easy Panels offer the easiest way to put slatwall in your garage, home office, laundry room and storage areas. The easy to install 2 ft. x 4 ft. slatwall panels ship via ground and weigh only 20 lbs. each. They can be easily installed as singles or in a stack or a strip. Together with the GarageEscape box of slatwall accessories, they will help to organize a wide assortment of tools, gear, toys, equipment and supplies.Easy to purchaseEasy to installEasy to useEasy to arrange and rearrange as needed
